name: Garmin Tempe Temperature Sensor
description: This external temperature sensor is unaffected by body heat, so you won’t get challenged about just how hot or cold it really was. The device clips to your pack, jacket or shoe and transmits data wirelessly to any compatible Garmin device.Works with many GPSMAP, Montana or Oregon GPS, the Fenix watch, and the VIRB Elite video camera.Uses 1 CR2032 battery.Transmits via 2.4GHz ANT+.Water resistant to 10m.
